item.description:
Hey everyone! Memorial Day Weekend is looking to be nice and temperate, so I thought it'd be a good weekend to organize a hike at Natchaug State Forest.

We will meet in the Parking Area off Kingsbury Road at 9a.m. We will wait 15 minutes for any latecomers so as to avoid leaving anyone behind.

The Blue (Natchaug) Trail runs north-south for quite some distance. I am recommending we head south and catch the blue/yellow trail which runs along the Natchaug River.

Please be advised I have never hiked here before, so I am not sure how difficult these trails are. Nevertheless, this will be a semi-casual hike, but please come prepared.

We can hike until late morning or noon and then have a picnic lunch for anyone who cares to:)

An online map of the trails can be found here: http://www.ct.gov/dep...

For more information and directions, go here: http://www.ct.gov/dep...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the redhead regretting such an early morning meetup :)

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Hiking at Natchaug State Forest
